thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Knowbella Tech Announces Intent To Conduct First Tier 2 Regulation A+ ICO

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Knowbella Tech Announces Intent To Conduct First Tier 2 Regulation A+ ICO
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Knowbella Tech LLC:
* KNOWBELLA TECH ANNOUNCES INTENT TO CONDUCT FIRST TIER 2 REGULATION A+ INITIAL COIN OFFERING (ICO)
* KNOWBELLA TECH SAYS INTENDS TO FILE AN OFFERING STATEMENT WITH U.S. SEC TO CONDUCT A $50 MILLION REGULATION A+ SECURITIES OFFERING IN U.S.
* ‍KNOWBELLA TECH SAYS PROCEEDS OF COIN OFFERING TO BE USED PRIMARILY TO LAUNCH A BLOCKCHAIN-ENABLED OPEN SCIENCE COLLABORATION PLATFORM​ Source text for Eikon:
